# title

**Instance Property**

The title string to display for the group of annotations.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The cluster annotation object automatically sets this string to the title of one of the annotations in its group.

## Getting the cluster attributes

- **subtitle**: The subtitle string to display for the group of annotations.

items.description: The subtitle string to display for the group of annotations.
items.name: subtitle

title: title
